h2: I am <1>Fernand</1>, a full-stack / Web3 dev lead in South Korea. Passionate about video-games, I currently work with Next.js, Node.js, Typescript & GraphQL.
skills subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for building modern web and blockchain applications
contact subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's work together to build something amazing.
about lead: Passionate developer with expertise in building modern web applications and blockchain solutions.
about card 1 body: Expert in modern web technologies, from React to Node.js, building scalable applications.
about card 2 body: Specialized in smart contracts, DApps, and decentralized solutions using Solidity and Web3.js.
about card 3 body: Passionate about emerging technologies and creating cutting-edge digital experiences.
name: Name
share: You want to share a beer with me? Here you go
desc part 1: Full-stack / Web3 dev lead programmer in Seoul, South Korea, I'm passionate about video games and everything related to it. I spend most of my time playing and learning new things ! I love to be involved in video game events such as Game Jams and Ludum Dares.
desc part 2: I have many other hobbies, like heavy metal music or traveling around the world. I've always thought these are the two best things to encounter new people, and enrich your own culture.
desc part 3: I created this portfolio to share some of my work and show you my passion!
